message.content:
Create a markdown file here:  docs\plans\Bookkeeper\2. IDEAs\FileUploadStories.md\
\
The document should consist of at least 10 user stories describing that should happen beginning from the point of having completed a dedup and upload queue process, and clicking the Start Upload button.  These user stories should describe what happens next form a user perspective.\
\
Do not start coding, just create user stories.

input.content:
# File Upload User Stories - Post Start Upload

This document outlines user stories describing what happens from a user perspective after completing the deduplication and upload queue process and clicking the "Start Upload" button.

## User Stories

### 1. Upload Progress Visibility
**As a user**, when I click "Start Upload", **I want** to see immediate visual feedback that the upload process has begun, **so that** I know my action was registered and the system is working.

### 2. Real-Time Upload Progress
**As a user**, **I want** to see a progress bar or percentage showing how many files have been uploaded versus the total, **so that** I can estimate how long the remaining upload will take.

### 3. Individual File Upload Status
**As a user**, **I want** to see the status of individual files (uploading, completed, failed) in the queue, **so that** I can identify any problematic files that need attention.

### 4. Upload Speed Information
**As a user**, **I want** to see the current upload speed (MB/s or files/min), **so that** I can understand if my connection is performing well and estimate completion time.

### 5. Pause and Resume Capability
**As a user**, **I want** to be able to pause the upload process if needed, **so that** I can manage my bandwidth or stop the process without losing progress.

### 6. Background Processing Continuation
**As a user**, **I want** the upload to continue even if I navigate to other parts of the application, **so that** I can multitask while the files are being processed.

### 7. Error Handling and Recovery
**As a user**, when a file fails to upload, **I want** to see clear error messages and have options to retry, **so that** I can resolve issues without restarting the entire process.

### 8. Duplicate File Handling
**As a user**, when the system encounters files that already exist in storage, **I want** to be notified and given options (skip, overwrite, rename), **so that** I have control over how duplicates are handled.

### 9. Network Interruption Recovery
**As a user**, if my internet connection is interrupted during upload, **I want** the system to automatically detect and resume when connectivity is restored, **so that** I don't lose upload progress.

### 10. Upload Completion Notification
**As a user**, when all files have been successfully uploaded, **I want** to receive a clear completion message with a summary of results, **so that** I know the process finished and can see what was accomplished.

### 11. Failed Upload Summary
**As a user**, after the upload process completes, **I want** to see a summary of any failed uploads with reasons, **so that** I can address issues and retry if needed.

### 12. Storage Usage Update
**As a user**, after upload completion, **I want** to see my updated storage usage statistics, **so that** I can understand how much space I've used and plan future uploads.

### 13. File Organization Preview
**As a user**, **I want** to see where my uploaded files will be organized in the system (folders, categories), **so that** I can find them easily later.

### 14. Batch Upload Cancellation
**As a user**, **I want** the ability to cancel the entire upload process if needed, **so that** I can stop unwanted uploads without waiting for completion.

### 15. Upload History Tracking
**As a user**, **I want** the system to remember my upload session details, **so that** I can reference what was uploaded and when for future organization or troubleshooting.

## Post-Upload Experience Stories

### 16. Navigation to Uploaded Files
**As a user**, after upload completion, **I want** quick navigation options to view my newly uploaded files, **so that** I can immediately verify and organize my content.

### 17. Upload Analytics
**As a user**, **I want** to see statistics about my upload session (total size, time taken, average speed), **so that** I can understand the performance and plan future uploads accordingly.

### 18. Cleanup and Reset
**As a user**, after reviewing upload results, **I want** the ability to clear the upload queue and start fresh, **so that** I can begin a new upload session without confusion from previous data.

# File Upload User Stories - Post Start Upload

This document outlines user stories describing what happens from a user perspective after completing the deduplication and upload queue process and clicking the "Start Upload" button.

## User Stories

### 1. Upload Progress Visibility
**As a user**, when I click "Start Upload", **I want** to see immediate visual feedback that the upload process has begun, **so that** I know my action was registered and the system is working.

### 2. Real-Time Upload Progress
**As a user**, **I want** to see a progress bar or percentage showing how many files have been uploaded versus the total, **so that** I can estimate how long the remaining upload will take.

### 3. Individual File Upload Status
**As a user**, **I want** to see the status of individual files (uploading, completed, failed) in the queue, **so that** I can identify any problematic files that need attention.

### 4. Upload Speed Information
**As a user**, **I want** to see the current upload speed (MB/s or files/min), **so that** I can understand if my connection is performing well and estimate completion time.

### 5. Pause and Resume Capability
**As a user**, **I want** to be able to pause the upload process if needed, **so that** I can manage my bandwidth or stop the process without losing progress.

### 6. Background Processing Continuation
**As a user**, **I want** the upload to continue even if I navigate to other parts of the application, **so that** I can multitask while the files are being processed.

### 7. Error Handling and Recovery
**As a user**, when a file fails to upload, **I want** to see clear error messages and have options to retry, **so that** I can resolve issues without restarting the entire process.

### 8. Duplicate File Handling
**As a user**, when the system encounters files that already exist in storage, **I want** to be notified and given options (skip, overwrite, rename), **so that** I have control over how duplicates are handled.

### 9. Network Interruption Recovery
**As a user**, if my internet connection is interrupted during upload, **I want** the system to automatically detect and resume when connectivity is restored, **so that** I don't lose upload progress.

### 10. Upload Completion Notification
**As a user**, when all files have been successfully uploaded, **I want** to receive a clear completion message with a summary of results, **so that** I know the process finished and can see what was accomplished.

### 11. Failed Upload Summary
**As a user**, after the upload process completes, **I want** to see a summary of any failed uploads with reasons, **so that** I can address issues and retry if needed.

### 12. Storage Usage Update
**As a user**, after upload completion, **I want** to see my updated storage usage statistics, **so that** I can understand how much space I've used and plan future uploads.

### 13. File Organization Preview
**As a user**, **I want** to see where my uploaded files will be organized in the system (folders, categories), **so that** I can find them easily later.

### 14. Batch Upload Cancellation

### 15. Upload History Tracking
**As a user**, **I want** the system to remember my upload session details, **so that** I can reference what was uploaded and when for future organization or troubleshooting.

## Post-Upload Experience Stories

### 16. Navigation to Uploaded Files

### 18. Cleanup and Reset
